title: Twitch prime
body: Ive linked my twitch prime account to league of legends but i cant claim my loot from twitch

replies.body: I believe it's related to the current store issues, but I'd recommend you submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I can't even link my account cause it says that it isn't supported in my region.

* Are you using the OCE site or the NA one? (Use the OCE one)
* Have you tried in a different browser?
* Have you submitted a ticket to player support?: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Is there even an oce site for it?
Because i cant find it anywhere.
There also isnt a option for anything to do with twitch in the support.
I've tried different web browsers but it still doesn't because there like isn't a oce site for me, when i click link account on the oce page it always takes me to the na site.

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/twitchprime/connect

As for player support, just use the "General League of Legends question" option.
That link doesnt work, like once it logs in and goes to the next page it switches to the na page making an error appear and it not working.

Login to Twitch or to that page? I'm logged in fine to that page but I don't have a twitch account to link to test that part out.

Either way support should be able to help you here.

have any1 got the loot in OCE server yet?
I do have twitch prime, already linked but couldnt claim the loot :(
I would recommend submitting a ticket to player support, they'll have more info about the process than I do.
